changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE [Articulo] ( [Id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY, [CategoriaId] int NOT NULL, [Orden] int NOT NULL, [Titulo] nvarchar(255) NOT NULL, [Descripcion] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [EstadoRegistro] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [FechaCreacion] datetime2 NOT NULL, [FechaModificacion] datetime2 NOT NULL, [FechaEliminacion] datetime2 NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Articulo] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]), CONSTRAINT [FK_Articulo_Categoria_CategoriaId] FOREIGN KEY ([CategoriaId]) REFERENCES [Categoria] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE ); GO CREATE INDEX [IX_Articulo_CategoriaId] ON [Articulo] ([CategoriaId]); GO
